ovdesc.p: This application defines the allocation matrix for each risk class profile by assigning the instrument level risk.

desc.p: Identifies the name of the risk class in a more descriptive form.
Each instrument has risk rating from 1 -7. With 1 being the lowest risk and 7 being the highest risk.
Each colour reflects the products of different risk level.multi value field.
Green - Products that are suitable to the client's risk profile.
Blue - Products which are authorised to be invested in the client's portfolio with a limit of 60%.
Yellow - These products are considered as eligible to the client's risk profile.
Red - These products are tolerated to the client's profile but with strong constraints.
Black - These products cannot be recommended or proposed to the client's risk profile.
Free text field to give more details about the risk class.
